snippet: In as much time as it takes to peel a peach, Ms. Reichl went from the top of the heap into free fall after Gourmet closed. Then she began to cook. (Article plus video.)
abstract: Food writer and editor Ruth Reichl, who has reinvented herself after shutdown of Gourmet magazine, has retired to country house in Spencertown, NY, to cook and write book My Kitchen Year: 136 Recipes that saved my life; recipes for chicken diavolo, egglplant salad and Ruth Reichl's giant chocolate cake given.
